title: Friends list nicknames
body:
I know it has probably been suggested before but I think I would be nice if you could add a nickname to the side of the peoples name to on your friends list to help you identify friends who have changed their names, or keep track of the people who change frequently. I have quite a few friends and Its hard for to to keep track of who is who when every time I log on someone has a new name.
I cant be the only person who thinks this is a good idea.

-VexonReaper
